name: Cardiotocography Dataset
description: 2126 fetal cardiotocograms (CTGs) were automatically processed and the respective diagnostic features measured. The CTGs were also classified by three expert obstetricians and a consensus classification label assigned to each of them. Classification was both with respect to a morphologic pattern (A, B, C, ...) and to a fetal state (N, S, P). Therefore, the dataset can be used either for 10-class or 3-class experiments.

licenses.name: Open Data Commons Public Domain Dedication and License (PDDL)

citation: Ayres de Campos et al. (2000) SisPorto 2.0 A Program for Automated Analysis of Cardiotocograms. J Matern Fetal Med 5:311-318, UCI

columns.name: FM
columns.description: Number of fetal movements per second

columns.name: UC
columns.description: Number of uterine contractions per second

columns.name: DL
columns.description: Number of light decelerations per second

columns.name: DS
columns.description: Number of severe decelerations per second

columns.name: DP
columns.description: Number of prolonged decelerations per second

columns.name: ASTV
columns.description: Percentage of time with abnormal short-term variability

columns.name: ALTV
columns.description: Percentage of time with abnormal long-term variability

columns.name: NSP
columns.description: Fetal state class code (N=normal; S=suspect; P=pathologic)
